content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 12}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 27, "index": 24}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft red_sandstone, I need to place 4 red_sand in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. I will start by placing 1 red_sand in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 12}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 27, "index": 24}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now place 1 red_sand in slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 12}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 27, "index": 24}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now place 1 red_sand in slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 12}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 27, "index": 24}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I will place 1 red_sand in slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4. This completes the 2x2 grid of red_sand in the crafting table, and I can now craft the red_sandstone.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 12}, {"type": "chiseled_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 19}, {"type": "dead_bush", "quantity": 27, "index": 24}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 10, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the red_sandstone has been crafted, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) to complete the task.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
